sys_metadata_link.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include">
    <sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE">
        <access>package_private</access>
        <active>true</active>
        <api_name>sn_decision_table.DecisionQuestionRepository</api_name>
        <caller_access/>
        <client_callable>false</client_callable>
        <description/>
        <name>DecisionQuestionRepository</name>
        <script><![CDATA[var DecisionQuestionRepository = Class.create();
DecisionQuestionRepository.prototype = {
    initialize: function() {},
    getDecisionsByDecisionTable: function(sysId, firstRow, lastRow, defaultAnswer) {
        var decisionsGr = new GlideRecord('sys_decision_question');
        decisionsGr.addQuery("decision_table", sysId);
        decisionsGr.addQuery("default_answer", defaultAnswer);
        decisionsGr.orderBy("order");
        decisionsGr.orderBy("sys_id");
        decisionsGr.chooseWindow(firstRow, lastRow);
        decisionsGr.query();

        return decisionsGr;
    },
    getObsoleteDecisionsByDecisionTable: function(sysId) {
        var decisionsGr = new GlideRecord('sys_decision_question');
        decisionsGr.addQuery("decision_table", sysId);
        decisionsGr.addQuery("marked_for_deletion", true);
        decisionsGr.query();

        return decisionsGr;
    },
    getDecisionsIncludingDelta: function(sysId, deltaSysId, firstRow, lastRow, includeDefaultDecision) {
        var decisionsGr = new GlideRecord("sys_decision_question");
        decisionsGr.addQuery("decision_table", sysId).addOrCondition("decision_table", deltaSysId);
        decisionsGr.addQuery("marked_for_deletion", false);
        var defaultAnswerValue = (includeDefaultDecision === true || includeDefaultDecision == "true") ? true : false;
        decisionsGr.addQuery("default_answer", defaultAnswerValue);

        decisionsGr.orderBy("order");
        decisionsGr.orderBy("sys_id");
        decisionsGr.chooseWindow(firstRow, lastRow);
        decisionsGr.query();

        return decisionsGr;
    },
    deleteObsoleteDecisions: function(sysId) {
        var builderAPI = new sn_dt.DecisionTableBuilderAPI();
        return builderAPI.deleteObsoleteQuestions(sysId);
    },
    syncDecisionsFromDelta: function(sysId, deltaSysId, answerTable) {
        var builderAPI = new sn_dt.DecisionTableBuilderAPI();
        return builderAPI.syncQuestionsFromDelta(sysId, deltaSysId, answerTable);
    },
    type: 'DecisionQuestionRepository'
};]]></script>
        <sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name>
        <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by>
        <sys_created_on>2023-04-14 13:40:30</sys_created_on>
        <sys_id>4d878d88539621104ab1ddeeff7b124d</sys_id>
        <sys_mod_count>3</sys_mod_count>
        <sys_name>DecisionQuestionRepository</sys_name>
        <sys_package display_value="Decision Table Builder" source="sn_decision_table">13aa96a16bcefa78b16cc99ed9e4f1f4</sys_package>
        <sys_policy/>
        <sys_scope display_value="Decision Table Builder">13aa96a16bcefa78b16cc99ed9e4f1f4</sys_scope>
        <sys_update_name>sys_script_include_4d878d88539621104ab1ddeeff7b124d</sys_update_name>
        <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by>
        <sys_updated_on>2023-05-30 06:32:28</sys_updated_on>
    </sys_script_include>
</record_update>
